content: many magical creatures live in the depths of the fairy forest for example a little leaf dragon it is not easy to see him because he is very good at disguising himself in the leaves however if you are lucky enough to see him you will definitely not forget it he is very curious playful and restless he likes to play with butterflies and sing to birds crochet level intermediate the pattern is a pdf file with detailed instructions and photos on how to create a dragon with butterfly the final size depends on the kind of yarn and hook you use with the specified materials the dragon is approximately 7 cm tall without horns i would be happy to see your little leaf dragon if you are going to share your picture in instagram please don t forget to - tag me as an author by adding pattern by @mom_cats_crafts - use hashtag #momcatspatterns also you may sell finished handmade items made from this pattern as long as they were made by yourself in a limited number please give credit to mom cat s crafts as the pattern designer i hope you ll enjoy this pattern happy crocheting
